column2: "Afei nna Israel mbanyin no akeka ntam wɔ Mizpa
column3: dɛ
column4: Hɔn mu obiara remmfa ne babaa mma Benjamin awar."

column2: "Na ɔman no baa Bɛtɛl
column3: na wɔbɛtsenaa Nyankopɔn enyim hɔ ma okodur ewimbir
column4: na wɔmemaa hɔn ndze do suu dzendzen."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ao EWURADZE
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iyi aba Israel yi
column6: dɛ ndɛ Israel mu ebusuakuw kor nnyi hɔ yi?"

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ adzekyee no
column3: ɔman no soɛɛr ahanamakye
column5: na wɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr."

column2: "Na Israelmba no see dɛ
column3: Woana na ɔwɔ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu a ɔno ɔammfow ammba bagua no mu wɔ EWURADZE nkyɛn? Osiandɛ nna wɔaka ntankɛse egu nyia ɔammfow ammba EWURADZE nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa no do

column2: "Na Israelmba no nuu hɔnho wɔ hɔn nua Benjamin ntsi
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ndɛ woetwa ebusuakuw kor efi Israel mu akyen."

column2: "Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ama hɔn a wɔaka no wɔ yernom ho afamu
column3: ɔnam dɛ yɛdze EWURADZE aka ntam dɛ yɛremmfa hɛn mbabaa mu bi mma hɔn awar yi?"

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu woana ara na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔno ɔammfow ammba EWURADZE nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa no? Na
column5: obiara emmfi Jabes-gilead ammba bagua no mu wɔ nseraban no mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ aber a wɔkaan ɔman no
column3: nna Jabes-gileadmba no mu biara nnyi hɔ."

column2: "Na Israel mboanofo no tuu mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam papaapa mpemduebien
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom nkɔ na hom mfa mfona nkoku Jabes-gilead mbanyin no nyinara

column2: "Na iyi nye adze a hom nyɛ; banyin biara na ɔbaa biara a banyin nye no ada no
column3: hom nsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa."

column2: "Na wohun Jabes-gileadmba no mu mbaabun ahaanan a wonnyim ɔbanyin dɛ wɔnye no ada: na wɔdze hɔn baa nseraban no mu wɔ Siloh a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do."
"Na dɔm no nyina somaa ma wɔkɛkasaa kyerɛɛ Benjaminmba a wɔwɔ Rimmon ɔbotan mu no
column3: na wɔpaa mu kaa nsiesie ho asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na Benjamin sanee baa aber no mu; na wɔdze mbaa a wɔgyee hɔn nkwa wɔ Jabes-gilead mbaa mu no maa hɔn: na dɛm no mpo so annso hɔn ano."
"Na ɔman no nuu hɔn ho wɔ Benjamin ntsi
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE ama mpaapaamu aba Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu."

column2: "Nna mboanofo no mu mpanyimfo no see dɛ
column3: Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ama hɔn a wɔaka no wɔ yernom ho afamu
column4: ɔnam dɛ mbaa ase ekum wɔ Benjamin mu yi?"

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔwɔ dɛ egyapadze bi ko hɔ ma hɔn a wofii nsa wɔ Benjamin mu no
column4: ma wɔammpepa ebusuakuw bi emmfi Israel mu."

column2: "Naaso yɛremmfa hɛn mbabaa mma hɔn awar: osiandɛ Israelmba aka ntam dɛ
column3: Ndom nka nyia ɔbɛma Benjamin yer."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wodzi EWURADZE n’afe afrenhyia afrenhyia wɔ Siloh a ɔwɔ Bɛtɛl kwaamu afamu
column5: wɔ ɔtsempɔn a ofi Bɛtɛl kɔ Sekem no no boka afamu

column2: "Na wɔhyɛɛ Benjaminmba no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ nkɛtsetsɛw wenyin nture no mu;"

column2: "na hom nhwɛ
column3: sɛ Siloh mbabaa no pue bɛsaw wɔ asaw no mu a
column4: ɔno hom mfi wenyin nture no mu mpue
column5: na hom mbɛkyekyer yernom nkorkor wɔ Siloh mbabaa no mu
column6: na wɔmfa nkɔ Benjamin asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ hɔn egyanom anaa hɔn nuanom ba bedzi ho nkɔmbɔ kyerɛ hɛn a
column5: Hom mfa hɔn ndom hɛn: osiandɛ yenngyaa yernom amma hɔn nkorkor wɔ ɔko no mu: nkyii so nnyɛ hom bi na wɔdze hɔn maa hɔn: ɔnodze nkyɛ hom bedzi so."

column2: "Na Benjaminmba yɛɛ dɛm
column3: na wɔfefaa yernom dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse wɔ hɔn a wɔbɛsawee a wɔkyekyeer hɔn no mu: na wosii mu sanee kɔr hɔn asaase do

column2: "Na Israelmba no fii hɔ aber no mu kɔree
column3: nyimpa biara kɔr n’ebusuakuw na n’ebusua mu
column4: na nyimpa biara fii hɔ kɔr n’egyapadze ho."

column2: "Nda no mu no nna ɔhen bi nnyi Israel: nyimpa biara dza ɔtsen wɔ noara n’enyi do no na ɔyɛe."
